name: Bullseye Throw
text:
Cost: 2 AP.
Make a thrown weapon attack with your sword or dagger against a target. If it succeeds, reduce the damage dealt by an amount equal to the target's speed. For each 1 damage reduced this way, temporarily reduce the target's speed by 1. If the target's speed is reduced to 0, they're immobilized until they dislodge your weapon or you recover it.
Restriction: You must be wielding a sword or dagger to use this ability.
